heading: HB03791
0: AN ACT PROHIBITING PERIMETER FENCING, SECURING, AND ACQUIRING AREA OF PROPERTY OCCUPIED BY INFORMAL SETTLERS AFTER A FIRE UNTIL CASE IS PENDING IN COURT AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
